      • getImage

        public static java.awt.Image getImage​(java.lang.String file)
        This should be the preferred method of loading images because this way it's friendlier for modding purposes.
        Parameters:
        file - PNG extension is added.
        Returns:
        An image from the avatar folder.

      • maketransparent

        public static java.awt.Image maketransparent​(float alpha,
                                             java.awt.Image image)
        Parameters:
        alpha - Alpha level. 1 is 100% opaque, 0 is 100% transparent.
